requestedFromName.description: The registered name of the 'requested from' party.

requestedForMeteringPointId.description: The unique identifier of the metering point this authorization applies to.

requestedForMeteringPointAddress.description: The physical address associated with the metering point.

balanceSupplierName.description: The name of the balance supplier.

balanceSupplierContractName.description: The name of the contract with the balance supplier.

startDate.description: The requested move-in start date. If set, must be today or earlier.

requestedBy.description: The party identifier of the actor who initiated the request (e.g., the GLN of the requesting balance supplier).

requestedFrom.description: The party identifier of the resource owner (who must grant the access). This is typically the person or organization being requested to sign the document.

requestedTo.description: The party identifier of the specific agent or person expected to review and sign the document on behalf of the 'requested from' party.

signedBy.description: The party identifier of the actual signer (populated after the document is signed).

redirectURI.description: The URI to which the user should be redirected after performing an action in minside.
